author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a heinous crime, a four-and-a-half-year-old girl was sexually assaulted and killed, allegedly by a 30-year-old man in Karimnagar district of Telangana on Saturday.

Kataram Inspector Sadan Kumar said the girl went to school on Saturday and did not return till late evening. The parents of the girl searched for her till night and, suspecting their neighbour Jakkula Venkataswamy (30), searched his house in the early hours of Sunday.

The parents found the girl’s body under a wooden basket in his house. The police visited the village and shifted the body to Godavarikhani area hospital for post-mortem.

The accused Venkatswamy was at large. The police have launched a manhunt for him.

In a press note here on Sunday, Balaka Hakkula Sangham president Anuradha Rao demanded the arrest of the accused and said he should be given the death penalty. Condemning the incident, she demanded that the government provide a compensation of Rs. 25 lakh to the bereaved family.
title: 4-year-old raped, killed in Telangana
